thread.section_title: Brilliance.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Brilliance.com | www.brilliance.com
thread.title: Erik Brodie

author: Erik Brodie
title: Erik Brodie
text: I looked all over the internet for a website that was easy to use and I found Brilliance. You can complete your entire order online, but I chose to call and ask some questions. I worked with Jennifer and she helped me with general diamond questions as well as helped me make the final decision on the setting. I couldn't be happier with the entire process from start to finish and my fianc√© loved it!
